title: Manifest.json Schema
description: qooxdoo's Manifest files serve to provide meta information for a library in a structured way. Their syntax is in JSON. They have a more informational part (keyed info), which is more interesting for human readers, a technical part (named provides) that is used in the processing of generator configurations, and a part named externalResources to include CSS and Javascript files.

$schema.description: the json schema of the version of Manifest.json

qooxdoo-versions.description: (deprecated) An array of qooxdoo versions that this library is compatible with. This property is deprecated and will be removed in version 7.

sourceViewUri.description: URL to view the library's class code online. This URL will be used in generated API documentation. It has a special syntax and allows for placeholders (e.g. for the class name and the source line number).

namespace.description: Library namespace (i.e. the namespace elements all class names in this library are prefixed with, e.g. foo for a main application class with name foo.Application).

encoding.description: File encoding of source code files

class.description: Path to the library's class code relative to the Manifest.json file, up to but not including the root namespace folder

resource.description: Path to the library's resources relative to the Manifest.json file, up to but not including the root namespace folder

translation.description: Path to the library's translation files relative to the Manifest.json file

environmentChecks.description: Maps environment check IDs to classes

fonts.description: List of fonts; the key is the font ID, the value is an object describing the font to declare

family.description: List of font family names that this font identifier represents

defaultSize.description: Default size of the font in pixels, usually only defined for icon fonts

comparisonString.description: String to use when looking for size differences, in order to detect that the font has loaded (default usually works just fine)

fontFaces.description: list of @font-face ruless need to be defined in order to use this font

fontFamily.description: the font face family name provided by the font files in `paths`, defaults to the font ID

fontWeight.description: the font-weight provided by the font files in `paths`

fontStyle.description: the font-style provided by the font files in `paths`

paths.description: List of paths in the local resources that contain the fonts

css.description: List of URLs for CSS, eg from a CDN

glyphs.description: JSON mapping that lists the glyphs to use (see `qx export-glyphs`)

mapping.description: Path to a json font map relative to the resource folder

comparisonString.description: String to test of font is loaded.

items.description: Path to the webfont file relative to the resource folder

requires.description: a list of of needed libraries and contribs. the keys `@qooxdoo/framework` is recognized to descript the respective versions of these components

externalResources.description: Static Javascript and CSS files that shall be always included without further processing by qooxdoo. All paths are relative to the resource folder stated in the 'provides' section.

setup.description: Setup Section - used in Qooxdoo SDK Manifest.json ... do we need this still?
